forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers, with winds diminishing for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with mostly clear conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
